name: validate-links
description: This project is a Node.js command-line tool that processes a given file or directory path. It checks if the path is valid, reads the file or directory, and prints a list of links found. If the --valida flag is provided, it validates the links before printing. The output is color-coded using the chalk library. The pegaArquivo function is used to read the file or directory, and the listaValidada function is used to validate the links.
author: Giovanni Cruz
